title: Citrix Systems to Go Private in $16.5 Billion Acquisition
sub_head: Elliott’s affiliate and Vista Equity to pay $104 a share for software company
body:
Citrix Systems Inc. will be taken private in an all-cash acquisition by Vista Equity Partners and Elliott Investment Management LP valued at $16.5 billion, including the assumption of debt.
Under the deal’s terms, Citrix stockholders will receive $104 a share. Elliott is participating in the acquisition through its Evergreen Coast Capital affiliate.
